Detailed Description

DRM manager used in encoding process.

Creates and stores keys (cipher encryptors), adds licenses for protected content.

Definition at line 32 of file IDRMEncManager.h.

Member Function Documentation

virtual BlowfishEncryptor* DRMPlugin::IDRMEncManager::CreateBlowfishEnc (  std::string &  contentID,
IXMLElement *  xmlDoc
)  [pure virtual]
 

Create blowfish encryptor.

Save (a newly created key) with respect to content ID. Use the information provided in the given XML document.

See the specific DRM manager documentation for the correct format of the XML document.

Parameters:
contentID input-output, string uniquely identifying the content.
xmlDoc input, XML document.
Returns:
If successful, newly created encryptor. If failed, zero pointer.
